mapper.select: SELECT FREEBOARD_NUMBER, FREEBOARD_TITLE, FREEBOARD_CONTENT, FREEBOARD_DATE, FREEBOARD_CATEGORY_SPORTS, FREEBOARD_CATEGORY_POST, FREEBOARD_VIEW, MEMBER_NUMBER FROM CNN_FREEBOARD WHERE rownum BETWEEN 1 AND 100 ORDER BY FREEBOARD_DATE DESC

SELECT FREEBOARD_NUMBER, FREEBOARD_TITLE, FREEBOARD_DATE, FREEBOARD_VIEW, FREEBOARD_CONTENT, MEMBER_NICKNAME, MEMBER_NUMBER FROM ( SELECT RNUM, FREEBOARD_NUMBER, FREEBOARD_TITLE, FREEBOARD_DATE, FREEBOARD_VIEW, FREEBOARD_CONTENT, MEMBER_NICKNAME, MEMBER_NUMBER FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, FREEBOARD_NUMBER, FREEBOARD_TITLE, FREEBOARD_DATE, FREEBOARD_VIEW, FREEBOARD_CONTENT, MEMBER_NICKNAME, MEMBER_NUMBER FROM ( SELECT FREEBOARD_NUMBER, FREEBOARD_TITLE, FREEBOARD_DATE, FREEBOARD_VIEW, FREEBOARD_CONTENT, MEMBER_NICKNAME, M.MEMBER_NUMBER FROM CNN_FREEBOARD F JOIN CNN_MEMBER M ON F.MEMBER_NUMBER = M.MEMBER_NUMBER ORDER BY FREEBOARD_DATE DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= #{page} * #{amount} ) WHERE RNUM > (#{page} - 1) * #{amount} )
SELECT * FROM CNN_FREEBOARD F JOIN CNN_MEMBER M ON F.MEMBER_NUMBER = M.MEMBER_NUMBER WHERE F.FREEBOARD_NUMBER = #{freeboardNumber}

SELECT F.FREEBOARD_NUMBER, F.FREEBOARD_CATEGORY_POST, F.FREEBOARD_CATEGORY_SPORTS, F.FREEBOARD_TITLE, M.MEMBER_NICKNAME, F.FREEBOARD_VIEW FROM CNN_FREEBOARD F JOIN CNN_MEMBER M ON F.MEMBER_NUMBER = M.MEMBER_NUMBER WHERE F.FREEBOARD_CATEGORY_SPORTS IS NOT NULL AND F.FREEBOARD_CATEGORY_POST IS NOT NULL ORDER BY F.FREEBOARD_VIEW DESC

SELECT F.FREEBOARD_NUMBER, F.FREEBOARD_CATEGORY_POST, F.FREEBOARD_CATEGORY_SPORTS, F.FREEBOARD_TITLE, M.MEMBER_NICKNAME, F.FREEBOARD_VIEW FROM CNN_FREEBOARD F JOIN CNN_MEMBER M ON F.MEMBER_NUMBER = M.MEMBER_NUMBER WHERE F.FREEBOARD_CATEGORY_SPORTS IS NOT NULL AND F.FREEBOARD_CATEGORY_POST IS NOT NULL AND MEMBER_NUMBER = #{memberNumber} ORDER BY F.FREEBOARD_VIEW DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE CNN_FREEBOARD SET FREEBOARD_TITLE = #{freeboardTitle}, FREEBOARD_CONTENT = #{freeboardContent}, FREEBOARD_DATE = SYSDATE, FREEBOARD_CATEGORY_SPORTS = #{freeboardCategorySports}, FREEBOARD_CATEGORY_POST = #{freeboardCategoryPost} WHERE FREEBOARD_NUMBER = #{freeboardNumber}
